name: Drunk Soccer is the Best Soccer
name_original: Drunk Soccer is the Best Soccer
description: Drunk Soccer is the Best Soccer– a third-person soccer simulator. The main feature of this game is that all the players on the pitch are drunk as skunks. When you’re drunk, it’s not that easy to just run on the pitch, and it’s yet more difficult to score a goal. There are no specific rules. The main objective is to score more goals than your opponent to win the game.
